errors.USNJ_GeoLocMsg1:
Sorry, we could not validate your location. You have to be inside New Jersey to play our games. Currently gameplay is only possible via Wi-Fi connection. Please log in after activating Wi-Fi connection.

If you still see this message inside New Jersey please visit our FAQs.
errors.USNJ_GeoLocMsg2:
Sorry, we cannot allow you to proceed. Our system indicates that you are in a region that does not allow this operation. This is due to regulatory restrictions.

If you are seeing this message in the state of New Jersey, we recommend you visit our FAQs and troubleshoot.
errors.USNJ_GeoLocMsg3: We are unable to confirm your physical location as being in New Jersey. By giving us your cell number and registering for location services, it is far more likely we will be successful in locating you and allowing you to play on our site.
errors.USNJ_SessionTimeLimit: You asked us to set a daily time limit for you and you've reached it for today. Thanks for playing. You'll be welcome to come back and play again tomorrow.
errors.USNJ_GeoLocMsg1_Init:
Sorry, you cannot play

We have detected that you are attempting to wager from outside the State of New Jersey. This conduct is in violation of New Jersey state law N.J.S.A. 5:12-95.23a. You should immediately cease and desist from attempting to wager from outside of New Jersey. We have retained your user information and future attempts could result in an enforcement action.

Please refrain from attempting to play until you are back to the State of New Jersey. If you are seeing this message in error, please contact our Customer Service team. Visit our FAQs to know more.
errors.USNJ_GeoLocMsg1_Play:
Sorry, you cannot continue playing

We have detected that you are attempting to wager from outside the State of New Jersey. This conduct is in violation of New Jersey state law N.J.S.A. 5:12-95.23a. You should immediately cease and desist from attempting to wager from outside of New Jersey. We have retained your user information and future attempts could result in an enforcement action.

All your open games will be closed now. You can resume them once you are back in New Jersey. Visit our FAQs to know more.
errors.USNJ_GeoLocMsg2_Init:
Sorry, you cannot play

We have detected that you are accessing the Internet through a proxy, VPN, or other service which has the ability to misrepresent the geographic location of a computer. While your use of this service may be inadvertent, we are not able to confirm your location legal requirement for online wagering. Please contact customer service department so we can help you resolve this problem.

Visit our FAQs to know more.
errors.USNJ_GeoLocMsg2_Play:

All your open games will be closed now. You'll be able to resume them once we are able to confirm your location to be in New Jersey. Visit our FAQs to know more.
errors.USNJ_GeoLocMsg3_Init:

Please contact our customer service department so we can help resolve this problem.

Visit our FAQs to know more and troubleshoot.
